name: Dragon Creek (itch)
description:
Ever wanted your own dragon? Dragon Creek is a dragon raising game where every dragon is procedurally generated. Enter a code at the shrine and see your dragon come to life. Care for your dragon as you train it for battle and compete in tournaments!

Entered early access in January of 2021 and released in May 2021. This was my first big project. I could not afford to continue developing it, but I really liked the concept. 

I would like to make another dragon taming game in the future, but in 3D.
